text:
This patch allow the ccmcheckout optional task to support fileset.
the support of a single file is still ok.
ex:
<ccmcheckout  comment="mycomment">
  <fileset dir="lib" >
    <include name="**/*.jar" />
  </fileset>
</ccmcheckout >
